bibl.title: Euripides. Selected Fragmentary Plays. Volume I. Telephus, Cretans, Stheneboea, Bellerophon, Cresphontes, Erectheus, Phaethon, Wise Melanippe, Captive Melanippe.
bibl.note: The second volume will include Alexandros, Palamedes, Sisyphus, Andromeda, Antiope, Archelaus, Hypsipyle, Oedipus and Philoctetes. An Index to both volumes will be printed at the end of the second.

COLLARD Christopher, Martin J. CROPP and Kevin H. LEE (with Introductions, Translations and Commentaries by), Euripides. Selected Fragmentary Plays. Volume I. Telephus, Cretans, Stheneboea, Bellerophon, Cresphontes, Erectheus, Phaethon, Wise Melanippe, Captive Melanippe.
Warminster, Aris and Phillips, 1995, 8Â°, viii-280 pp. ISBN 0-85668-618-2 (hbk) / 0-85668-619-0 (pbk).
